price: 109. Loba: Soki ebale ya monene ezalaki lokola mayi ya mokanda, (тропа кокота na yango) maloba та Nkolo wa ngai (Allah), elingaki kokawuka liboso, mpe maloba ya Nkolo nangai esili te, ata soki toyei na ebale mosusu lokola yango mbala ebele.
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ ٱلۡبَحۡرُ مِدَادٗا لِّكَلِمَٰتِ رَبِّي لَنَفِدَ ٱلۡبَحۡرُ قَبۡلَ أَن تَنفَدَ كَلِمَٰتُ رَبِّي وَلَوۡ جِئۡنَا بِمِثۡلِهِۦ مَدَدٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qul law kāna al-baḥru midādan likalimāti rabbī lanafida al-baḥru qabla an tanfada kalimātu rabbī walaw ji'nā bimith'lihi madadan
